data.title: Rapid Rewards Shopping Partners
data.meta_description: Earn points to shop with Rapid Rewards Shopping. Southwest partners include over 800 top store like Macys, Home Depot, Sephora and more.
data.text:
Rapid Rewards ShoppingÂ® is an exclusive site for Rapid Rewards Members to earn points on their everyday online purchases.

Shop at over 800 top stores like Macys, Sephora, Staples, and more.

Gain access to exclusive deals and bonus points.

Receive valuable coupons to stores you love.

Bookmark rapidrewardsshopping.southwest.com for easy access and start your online shopping with us every time. Rapid Rewards Shopping is an easy way to earn points without stepping on a plane.

Start shopping and earning more points!

Learn more

Additional Program Details

Rapid Rewards Members can earn points for purchases made through Rapid Rewards Shopping.

You must have a valid Rapid Rewards account and e-mail address to shop and earn Rapid Rewards Points with Rapid Rewards Shopping.

If you have a question about the items you purchased online, please contact the retailer directly. However, for all questions or concerns about Rapid Rewards Shopping, please fill out this Rapid Rewards Shopping form for customer service to assist you.

Taxes, special handling charges, returns, freight or shopping costs, and any unshipped products are not included in the points calculation.

For more information and complete terms and conditions about Rapid Rewards Shopping, visit rapidrewardsshopping.southwest.com.

Please allow six to eight weeks from purchase date for points to post to your Rapid Rewards account. Some exceptions do apply. See participating retailer offer information on the Rapid Rewards Shopping web site for complete information.

If you are not already a Rapid Rewards Member, enroll now.

All Rapid Rewards rules and regulations apply.
